did.head: DESCRIPTIVE SUMMARY
did.unittitle: Agricultural economics and farm management survey and course records, 1906-1950.

origination.label: Creator:
origination.corpname: New York State College of Agriculture and Life Sciences. Department of Agricultural Economics.

did.physdesc: 358 reels negative microfilm, 358 reels positive microfilm; c. 40.6 cubic ft.
Surveys, microfilm, financial records, and course material.
did.repository: Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library
did.abstract: Survey records of various New York State counties. Additional cost account records for New York State farms(on microfilm); individual farm summaries and inventories; and procedures manuals and teaching materials on cost accounting.

scopecontent.head: COLLECTION DESCRIPTION
scopecontent.p: Survey records include Livingston County survey, 1918, 1928, 1938; NYS milk retailing survey, 1983; milk producer-distribution survey records, 1938; marginal farm land survey records, Chenango County, 1925 and Chautauqua County, 1925; pasture surveys, Cortland, Delaware, St. Lawrence, Orange, Steuben, Tioga, Erie, Seneca, and Lewis Counties, 1935; market pea production survey, Madison/Erie Counties, 1925; Ithaca dealer survey, 1940; farm account records, Seneca County, 1931-1933; milk dealer survey records, New York City, 1933; cabbage survey records, Onondaga County, 1938-1939 and 1940; and labor income survey records, Wayne County, 1940. Participating individuals included George W. Warren, Earl Mulford Hughes, K.C. Livermore, G.P. Scofield, E.C. Young, and Stanley W. Warren. Additional cost account records for New York State farms, 1914-1983 (on microfilm, 1936-1983); individual farm summaries and inventories; and procedures manuals and teaching materials on cost accounting.

Also, cost account tabulations, 1979-1983 (5 v.); list of cost accounts, 1913-1983 (3 v.); Carl Ladd's 1913 record book (1 v.); volume relating to extension work in Livingston County by S.W. Warren, 1929-1931; Paul Williamson, cost account analyses and instruction, 1925-1938 (4 v.); binder listing cost account cooperators, 1913-1983; binder of enterprise cost account tabulations; and binder of labor income tabulations.
Includes course material, exams, and lecture notes for various courses in the Dept. of Agricultural Economics, including Farm Management, Marketing, and Economics and Business History.

userestrict.head: Restrictions on Use:
userestrict.p: Most of these records were taken with an explicit or implicit understanding that they would be confidential. Consequently individuals named in the records may not be cited until 80 years after the record was created.

prefercite.head: Cite As:
prefercite.p: New York State College of Agriculture and Life Sciences. Dept. of Agricultural Economics. Agricultural economics and farm management survey records, #21-10-2261. Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library.

scopecontent.p: All the material in the collection may not be covered by this guide.
